description: .hgignore: delete references to Make.inc and syslist.go

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=802195182498 ***

.hgignore: delete references to Make.inc and syslist.go

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5752066

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

there are probably a bunch more in there, but this is progress.

On Tue, Mar 6, 2012 at 7:05 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> .hgignore: delete references to Make.inc and syslist.go
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5752066/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5752066/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M .hgignore
>
>
> Index: .hgignore
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/.hgignore
> +++ b/.hgignore
> @@ -30,7 +30,6 @@
>  misc/goplay/goplay
>  misc/osx/*.pkg
>  misc/osx/*.dmg
> -src/Make.inc
>  src/cmd/6a/6a
>  src/cmd/?l/enam.c
>  src/cmd/cc/y.output
> @@ -42,7 +41,6 @@
>  src/pkg/exp/norm/**maketesttables
>  src/pkg/exp/norm/normregtest
>  src/pkg/exp/ebnflint/ebnflint
> -src/pkg/go/build/syslist.go
>  src/pkg/go/doc/headscan
>  src/pkg/runtime/goc2c
>  src/pkg/runtime/mkversion
>
>
>

On Mar 7, 2012, at 2:06 PM, Brad Fitzpatrick wrote:

> LGTM
> 
> there are probably a bunch more in there, but this is progress.

dsymonds and i did a cleanup pass a while back. there are fewer than there were.

-rob

subject: code review 5752066: .hgignore: delete references to Make.inc and syslist.go
